successes.title: Millennium Blades -- The CCG-Simulator Board Game
successes.description: Millennium Blades is a Board Game about a group of friends who play a Collectible Card Game called Millennium Blades.

Pledges.description: CUSTOM PLEDGE - After the project ends, you'll be able to customize your pledge via our Pledge Manager Website, adding on any games from the Level 99 Games line.
This is a great way to show your support now and participate in the discussion and development of the game, even if you can't make a full pledge until later on.
Customization is available for all higher tiers as well.

PROTOTYPE CARD - An actual Millennium Blades Prototype Card used by us in the development of the game, signed by the designer. Also includes any sponsored promotional cards created during the project.
This reward is included in all higher-level rewards as well!
PLAYMAT - A special-edition playmat featuring the Millennium Blades characters. Perfect for use with any tabletop CCG.
GAMER - Get a copy of Millennium Blades.
POWER GAMER - Get a copy of Millennium Blades, and the Expansion game, Millennium Blades: Set Rotation.
THREE GAMERS - Get 3 copies of Millennium Blades (what else were you expecting this to be?)
You can add $55 per copy (+$5 international shipping) for additional copies, up to a limit of six.
THREE POWER GAMERS - Get 3 copies of Millennium Blades AND the expansion box, Millennium Blades: Set Rotation.
You can add $85 per copy (+$10 international shipping) for additional copies, up to a limit of six).

BRONZE PROMO - Your likeness on a Bronze-tier promo card. Artist FÃ¡bio Fontes will take your photo and mix it with a theme of your choice to create a unique promo. (We reserve the right to reject certain themes. Ask us before selecting this reward.)
Also includes the GAMER tier rewards.
